# Install `R`

1. Go to https://www.r-project.org
2. Click on "CRAN" on the left bar and select a mirror (0-Cloud is just fine!)
3. Click Download R for your OS and follow installation instructions

# Install RStudio (optional)

1. Go to https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/
2. Click "Download" for RStudio Desktop Open Source License (Free)
3. Choose your OS and follow installation instructions

# Install packages

1. Open RStudio (or R console)
2. Run the installation script
